mdRecord.dcterms:title: J.C. Slaughter Cemetery, Indian Valley District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Fenced and beautifully maintained. Located across from 393 Sutphin Rd. NW. in the Horse Ridge area of Indian Valley on the Jessie Crockett Slaughter Homeplace. Visible on Google Earth. N 36 56.078' W 80 34.601'
